name: Aesir
body:
### Welcome to Aesir.
Aesir is an attempt to step unRAID up a gear.

unRAID is a fantastic Home media NAS solution, but the interface doesn't reflect the quality of the underlying product, as unRAID enthusiasts we decided to take on the project of making an awesome GUI that would showcase the quality of unRAID.

### Technologies used
* SASS
* Codeigniter 3.0.0 ( With additional Modular Extensions HMVC )
* PHP 5.4+
* jQuery
* SQLite3

### Installing
If you have a cache drive with an appdata share go to the webgui / plugins / Install Plugin and paste the following in:
`http://linuxserver.io/aesir/aesir-cache.plg`

If you do **not** have a cache drive you can alternatively install it on the flash drive with:
`http://linuxserver.io/aesir/aesir-flash.plg`

You only need to do 1 or the other, **NOT** both.

It will then be accessible from http://serverip:8888 where serverip is the ip of your unRAID server

### Authors and Contributors
Core developer: Chris Hunt (@kodestar)

### Support or Contact
[![Visit our IRC channel](https://kiwiirc.com/buttons/chat.freenode.net/linuxserver.io.png)](https://kiwiirc.com/client/chat.freenode.net/#linuxserver.io)
